name: Alternative Laser Defender
description:
Destroy all the enemies. When all enemies are dead you gain a life. Hit the airship twice and you will gain extra hit. Use the arrows and the space bar.

- Left/ Right arrows = Move left/ right. 
- Down arrow/ Spacebar = Absorb enemy's projectile.
- Up arrow / Spacebar = Shoot the absorbed projectile back to the enemies.

Main idea: 
1. Press on time to absorb the projectile (the closer, the more power).You can only absorb ONE projectile at a time.
2. Press on time to shoot (spinning wheel color indicates if more power will be added).
3. Press on time (on position) to successfully hit the enemy.

Full Gameplay:
